entry.title: Published Papers
entry.summary:
[1]Kai Jing, Ningmei Yu, Xing Quan, et al.Dynamic equalization and fast settling based wide operating voltage range 93 dB PSRR PTAT current reference. Microelectronics Journal. (已录用，DOI：10.1016/j.mejo.2020.104812，2020，SCI收录)
[2]Kai Jing, Ningmei Yu, Xi Wang,et al. Methodology of Noise Flatness Based on Network Quality Factor in RF Wideband Applications. Circuits, Systems, and Signal Processing. （Early Access，DOI：10.1007/s00034-020-01380-3，2020，SCI收录）
[3]Kai Jing, Ningmei Yu, Xing Quan. An S- to Ku- wideband low-noise amplifier using asymmetric π filter and shunt-peaking technique with simultaneous input match and noise flatness, Microwave and Optical Technology Letters, Vol. 61, No. 6：1509-1516, 2019. (SCI收录) WOS：000465078300013
[4]Kai Jing, Ningmei Yu, Zhongjie Guo, et al. A 20 ppm/℃ Current Reference with improved ZTC Characteristic for SerDes application. IEEE International Conference on Electron Devices and Solid-State Circuits(EDSSC), 2019. (EI收录) Accession number:20193007225864
[5]井凯,余宁梅,戴扬,王希.适用于高速背板通信的动态增益与盲均衡协同校正自适应均衡模型, 西北大学学报(自然科学版), 49(06): 888-894, 2019.(中文核心收录)
[6]Yang Zhaonian, Yang Yuan, Jing Kai, et al. Diode and RC Co-Triggered 2xVDD-Tolerant Electrostatic Discharge Detection Circuit in Nanoscale Complementary Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Technology. Journal of Nanoelectronics and Optoelectronics, Vol. 14, No.5: 734-739, 2019.(SCI收录) WOS:000462778400021
[7]Liu Liwen, Zhuang Yiqi, Zhang Li, Jing Kai, Dong Siwan, Chen Yushi. A Reconfigurable Low Noise Amplifier with Sub-amplifier Compensation for Wearable Wireless Neural Recording System. IEEE International Conference on Electron Devices and Solid-State Circuits, (EDSSC), 2019. (EI收录) Accession number:20193007225961
[8]Kai Jing, Ningmei Yu, Xing Quan. A 168 dB high gain folded cascode operational amplifier for Delta-Sigma ADC, IEEE Conference on Industrial Electronics and Applications: 2228-2231, 2019.(EI收录) Accession number:20194107525614
[9]Guo Zhongjie, Zhang Qian, Jing Kai. Offset-free Column Buffer for CMOS image sensor. IEEE International Conference on Electron Devices and Solid-State Circuits, (EDSSC), 2019. (EI收录) Accession number:20193007226096
[10]Quan Xing, Zhuang Yiqi, Li Zhenrong, Zhang Yanlong, Jing Kai. A 2–22 GHz low-imbalanced active balun in 0.18 um SiGe BiCMOS technology, AEU-International Journal of Electronics and Communications, Vol. 70, No. 10: 1367-1373, 2016. (SCI收录)
[11]Quan Xing, Zhuang Yiqi, Li Zhenrong, Zhang Yanlong, Jing Kai, Zhan Jinsong. Current generator for 6-bit active phase shifter. Electronics Letters, Vol. 51, No. 15: 1175-1176, 2015. (SCI收录)
[12]Kai Jing, Yiqi Zhuang, Zhenrong Li, et al. Design and Analysis on Four Stage SiGe HBT Low Noise Amplifier, High Technology Letters. Vol. 3, No. 21: 358-363, 2015. (EI收录) Accession number:20154201390413
[13]井凯, 庄奕琪, 李振荣, et al. 适用于802.11a的低噪声放大器设计. 浙江大学学报(工学版), 2015(03):89-94. (EI收录) Accession number:20151900817848
[14]Zhang Yanlong, Zhuang Yiqi, Li Zhenrong, Ren Xiaojiao, Wang Bo, Jing Kai. A 5-bit lumped 0.18-mu m CMOS step attenuator with low insertion loss and low phase distortion in 3-22 GHz applications, Microelectronics Journal, Vol. 4, No. 45:468-476, 2015. (SCI收录)
[15]Kai Jing, Yiqi Zhuang, Huaxi Gu. A high image rejection SiGe low noise amplifier using passive notch filter. IEICE ELECTRONICS EXPRESS, Vol. 3, No. 11:1-5, 2014. (SCI收录) WOS:000333894200005
[16]Kai Jing, Yiqi Zhuang, Zhenrong Li, et al. A SiGe HBT low noise amplifier using on-chip notch filter for K band wireless communication. Microelectronics Journal, Vol. 6, No. 45:683-689, 2014. (SCI收录) WOS:000337553900016
[17]Kai Jing, Yiqi Zhuang, Zhenrong Li, et al. A SiGe LC-ladder low noise amplifier with base resistance match, gain and noise flatness for UWB applications, Microelectronics Journal, Vol. 6, No. 45: 648-656, 2014. (SCI收录) WOS:000337553900012
[18]Kai Jing, Yiqi Zhuang, Zhenrong Li. Volterra series-based linearity enhancement design of low noise amplifier. Journal of Sichuan University (Engineering Science Edition), Vol. 1, No. 46, 2014. (EI收录) Accession number:20142717903436
[19]Du Yongqian, Zhuang Yiqi, Li Xiaoming, Jing Kai. New type of voltage reference with low voltage and low power, Journal of Huazhong University of Science and Technology(Natural Science Edition), Vol. 11, No. 41, 2013. (EI收录)
